column8: text

That's right, blame EVERYONE else but never admit that you erred https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/372569Lim Kit Siang has accused Umno and BN leaders, including Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak, of initiating the most ambitious "black ops" to date in order to destroy DAP.He claimed that these leaders and their propagandists are employing the “triple politics of fear, hate and lies, involving ministers and even the prime minister himself.”Lim said this in reference to Najib's statement on Twitter last Saturday declaring that the DAP veteran was the de facto opposition leader and Rural and Regional Development Minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob's attack on him."It was all part of the 'black ops' campaign to create panic and fear among the Malays, seeking to make them believe that if Umno loses, I will become the prime minister of Malaysia and that I am anti-Malay and anti-Islam," he added.Lim claimed that the mainstream media controlled by Umno and BN had in the past week also participated in the alleged "black ops" against DAP.He added that they have also exploited the resignation of four Malacca DAP elected representatives from the party.The four are Kota Melaka MP Sim Tong Him, Duyong assemblyperson Goh Leong San, Bachang assemblyperson Lim Jak Wong and Kesidang assemblyperson Chin Choong Seong."The masterminds of the 'Black Ops' are trying to orchestrate an implosion of DAP, hoping to get more DAP leaders, members and branches to quit the party," claimed Lim.However, he said the "politics of fear, hatred and lies" against the DAP would not succeed in destroying the party."As is very clear during my visit to various parts of Malacca yesterday, the people are disappointed at the defection of one MP and three assemblymen in Malacca, but their support for DAP remains as strong as ever.

Im guessing RPK is among the key RBA that left and now part of najibs boffin boys ?--Yesterday, Kit Siang lamented that DAP’s Red Bean Army has been defeated by Najib’s Boffin Boys. What took ten years to develop was demolished in just two years. So DAP now no longer monopolises the internet like it used to.Just to digress a bit, it seems some of the key players in the RBA have left because they were not being paid enough like when DAP’s Black Ops first started in 2004.This is like a prostitute calling another woman a whore. It was DAP that started the whole operation in 2004, which ‘exploded’ in 2008 when DAP suddenly ‘owned’ Penang and with it lots of money. And now DAP is merely getting a taste of its own medicine. Somehow, though, Kit Siang does not like the taste of his own medicine, which was the reason for his blog posting yesterday.And that is what really upset Kit Siang, as you may have noticed from his blog posting yesterday. For ten years from 2004 to 2014 DAP developed its Red Bean Army cyber-trooper operation. And in just two years, from February 2015 to February 2017, Najib’s Boffin Boys demolished their operation. And Kit Siang has more or less conceded defeat in his blog posting yesterday.http://www.malaysia-today.net/kit-siang-ad...-army-defeated/
